Happy Monday! This is the last chance for your child to see his/her teacher in person. Below is the Primary schedule for picking up student materials and returning Primary library books for this school year. This will take place next week as a drive-thru event in the front drop off area of the Primary School. When you drive-up on your child’s scheduled day and time, you will look for your child’s teacher table. You will park in front of that table. On the morning of September 30th, PISD Police and PHS Administrators received notification about an Instagram post with a possible threat to PHS. It did not say Pleasanton High School, only PHS. After investigating the incident, it became clear this was not a credible threat to Pleasanton High School or any other campus within our district. All campuses in PISD are secure and we are proceeding with our normal school day.

Student safety is our top priority. We take all potential threats seriously as a violation of the law and the Pleasanton ISD Student Code of Conduct. Please encourage your children to contact a school administrator, teacher, counselor, parent or PISD police immediately if they ever become aware of a possible threat to our schools. Help us keep our schools safe by reporting all suspicious activity immediately.

Thank you to everyone involved today for always keeping our schools, students and staff safe.
